Title: Black Ark Fleetmaster
Legend: Fleetmasters are rulers of the high seas, Corsair lords who command the marauding Black Arks of the Scourge Privateers. Peerless swordfighters,they delight in seeking out worthy foes against whom to test their skill.
Intro: A Black Ark Fleetmaster is armed with a Wicked Cutlass and Murder Hook.

Rules.Name: Murderous Swashbuckler
Rules.Fluff: Fleetmasters are master duellists who have perfected the art of the riposte.
Rules.Rule: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets this unit is 1, the attacking unit suffers 2 mortal wounds after all of its attacks have been resolved.

Rules.Name: ‘At Them, You Curs!’
Rules.Fluff: Under the command of their Fleetmaster, Scourge Corsairs slaughter the enemy without mercy
Rules.Rule: When this unit issues the All-out Attack command to a friendly SCOURGE PRIVATEERS unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s weapons until the end of the phase. This effect is in addition to the normal effect of All-out Attack.
